actions.recommendation: PSA testing: annually, if one first-degree relative who had prostate cancer at <65yrs or female relatives diagnosed with BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene mutation breast cancer. From age 45: if history of prostate cancer on either the mother or fatherâ€™s side.From age 50: every 2 years

Blood pressure: Ideal blood pressure is considered to be between 90-60mmHg diastolic (bottom number) and 120- 80mmHg systolic (top number). Your systolic is slightly elevated please check this again and if remains high implement lifestyle changes in consultation with your doctor.
